title: The Yestertime Effect
description: What is happening to all the time travelers? Time travelers Ray Burton and Natalie Oâ€™Brien were living peacefully in 1958 England. Now they are missing. What has happened to them, and why are travelers throughout time being targeted for elimination? In the thrilling sequel to the Amazon bestseller, Yestertime, the impossible has happened. And now, some people will do anything to stop it.
author: Andrew  Cunningham
